text: James Blackburn Adams (December 21, 1926 - April 25, 2020) was an American attorney and politician. He served as an acting director of the Federal Bureau of Investigation from February 15, 1978 through February 23, 1978. Texas Legislators Past and Present-James B. Adams He was born in Corsicana, Texas. Adams died on April 25, 2020 in Kerrville, Texas of a suspected heart attack, aged 93.Colonel James Blackburn Adams ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Directors of the Federal Bureau of Investigation Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from San Antonio, Texas Category:Lawyers from San Antonio Category:People from Corsicana, Texas
title: James B. Adams
